title: Lewisham
summary: Lewisham (/ˈluːɪʃəm/) is an area of south east London, England, 5.9 miles (9.5 km) south of Charing Cross. It is the principal area of the London Borough of Lewisham, and is also within the historic county of Kent. It is identified in the London Plan as one of 35 major centres in Greater London,[1] with a large shopping centre and street market.
